July 9, 1978 D Washington Invitation Contest
Washington Invitation Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
washington-invitation-contest
None
Washington Comprehensive School, Spout Lane, Washington, Tyne and Wear Prizes - 1st £150 and trophy, 2nd £125, 3rd £100, £50 for best section 2 band, £50 for best section 3 band. 9 bands competed.
